diff_hunk: @@ -31,11 +31,12 @@ p.well Please make sure you have read our #{link_to "mentor guide", 'http://rail = f.input :source_url, as: :url, wrapper_html: { class: 'col-md-6' }, label: "Repository", placeholder: 'Link to your source code (Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket, …)' = f.input :description, wrapper_html: { class: 'col-md-6' }, placeholder: "What's your project about?", input_html: { rows: 5 }, hint: 'You can use basic Markdown here.'.html_safe = f.input :issues_and_features, wrapper_html: { class: 'col-md-6' }, placeholder: "A list of possible features to work on, maybe even concrete Github issues", input_html: { rows: 5 }, hint: 'You can use basic Markdown here.'.html_safe + = f.input :requirements, wrapper_html: { class: 'col-md-6' }, placeholder: "E.g. good knowledge of a specific programming language, proficiency with CSS, etc. Maybe a coding challenge (on Exercism.io, Codeschool, Codewars, etc.) that needs to be completed.", input_html: { rows: 6 }, hint: 'You can use basic Markdown here.'.html_safe
body: "You can list requirements here, e.g. skill level of a programming language or framework. You can illustrate the required skill level with a relevant coding challenge that needs to be completed (on Exercism.io, Codeschool course, Codewars or something of your own choice.) "
body_html: "You can list requirements here, e.g. skill level of a programming language or framework. You can illustrate the required skill level with a relevant coding challenge that needs to be completed (on Exercism.io, Codeschool course, Codewars or something of your own choice.) "
